text: Jânio Daniel do Nascimento Santos, simply known as Jânio (born 3 July 1991), is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Associação Atlética de Altos as a forward. ==Club career== Born in Parnaíba, Piauí, Jânio graduated from Coritiba's youth setup, and was subsequently loaned to CFZ-DF, São Carlos, Ferroviário,Atacante Jânio Daniel regularizado para o Clássico das Cores (Forward Jânio regularized for Clássico das Cores); Ferroviário's official website, 26 February 2012 J. Malucelli,J.Malucelli tem nove jogadores do Coritiba (J.Malucelli has nine Coritiba players); Futebol Paranaense, 9 January 2013 Parnahyba,Parnahyba contrata Janio Daniel por empréstimo junto ao Coritiba (Parnahyba signs Janio Daniel on loan from Coritiba); Reavendo Notícias, 14 February 2013 and Junior Team.Atacante Jânio do Coxa se apresenta a Junior Team (Forward Jânio from Coxa presents himself to Junior Team); Redação em Campo, 27 May 2013 After scoring five goals with the latter, he returned to Coxa in September 2013.Dudu Figueiredo e Jânio voltam para o Coritiba e já treinam com o grupo (Dudu Figueiredo and Jânio return to Coritiba and already train with the squad); Globo Esporte, 2 September 2013 Jânio made his Coritiba – and Série A – debut on replacing Bill in a 0–3 away loss against Atlético Mineiro.Em grande fase na seleção, Jô faz três no Coritiba e tira o Galo do Z-4 (In great form with Seleção, Jô scores three in Coritiba and takes Galo out of Z-4); Globo Esporte, 12 September 2013 He appeared in five matches during the campaign, as his side narrowly avoided relegation. On 8 January 2014 Jânio signed for Criciúma.Atacante Jânio treina e lateral-esquerdo Rogério chega ao Criciúma (Forward Jânio trains and left back Rogério arrives in Criciúma); Globo Esporte, 8 January 2014 On 10 February he was loaned to Nacional-MG,Criciúma fecha empréstimo de três, e espera repassar mais dois jogadores (Criciúma completes loan of trio, and hopes to transfer further two); Globo Esporte, 12 February 2014 appearing regularly and scoring three goals. On 7 July 2014 Jânio joined Portuguesa on loan until the end of the year.Série B: Portuguesa contrata Ramírez, Fran e Jânio (Série B: Portuguesa signs Ramírez, Fran and Jânio); Futebol Interior, 7 July 2014 ==References== ==External links== * *Jânio at ZeroZero Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Piauí Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Coritiba Foot Ball Club players Category:Criciúma Esporte Clube players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players Category:Atlético Monte Azul players Category:Anápolis Futebol Clube players Category:Serra Talhada Futebol Clube players Category:Mogi Mirim Esporte Clube players Category:Parnahyba Sport Club players Category:Guarany Sporting Club players Category:Associação Atlética de Altos players
title: Jânio Daniel do Nascimento Santos
